oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Paris speech in the past
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: text_and_corpus_linguistics
Electronic publications -- Great Britain -- 20th century
Corpora -- Great Britain -- 20th century
Linguistic corpora -- Great Britain -- 20th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A collection of semi-literary representations of vernacular (French) speech from the 16th to 19th centuries which is preceeded by a set of tax-rolls from late 17th century Paris
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Oxford Text Archive, University of Oxford
